title: Collection: Academies financial notices to improve
text:
Academies financial notices to improve From: 27 January 2017, see all updates Letters issued by Education Funding Agency (EFA) to academy trusts with a financial notice to improve. Contents 
You can also read the EFA investigation publishing policy . Open notices Financial notice to improve: The Basildon Academies added. 13 January 2017 Updated to include the financial notice to improve for Building Futures Enterprise Academy Trust. 6 January 2017 Updated to move Enterprise South Liverpool Academy Trust and Otley Prince Henry’s Academy Trust from open to closed notices. 25 November 2016 Updated to add The Ridings Federation of Academies Trust. added. 4 October 2016 FNtI for Heathrow Aviation Engineering UTC added. 23 September 2016 FNtIs for Robert Owen Academy Trust and The Education Fellowship Trust added. 8 July 2016 The Ursuline Academy link to the EFA investigation publishing policy.
